page.title: 10ACCOMMODATION IN AYLMERTON
page.content: Aylmerton is popular with foreign visitors. "Woodlands" guest house is situated on the A148 Cromer to King's Lynn road, and is well-placed for visitors to the area. July to August is the most popular time. It seems very popular, as guests often come back the following year. During the summer, up to twelve guests can be accommodated, with an average of four to six in winter. "Woodlands" has its own swimming pool but people tend to go to the nearest beach. Holidaymakers come from Europe - mainly from Holland and West Germany. Others come from as far away as Australia and Canada on extended holidays of up to three months. "Woodlands" is a family business and the house has recently been extended.
